Class SortingRequest

java.lang.Object
pl.put.poznan.sortingmadness.rest.SortingRequest
public class SortingRequest extends Object
Represents a sorting request. Contains information required for sorting, including sorting keys, sorting parameters, input data, and the maximum number of iterations.

    • mapObjectListToComparableMapList

      public List<Map<String,Comparable>> mapObjectListToComparableMapList(List<Map<String,Object>> objectList)
      Converts a list of maps containing generic objects to a list of maps containing Comparable objects.
      Parameters:
      objectList - the input list of maps
      Returns:
      a list of maps with Comparable values

      public List<Map<String,Comparable>> getData()
      Retrieves the input data for sorting.
